document_data.mainbody:
ervan Llarabbar was a drow mage in Velkynvelve in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, after the demise of Ilvara Mizzrym, Servan was chosen as the next leader of Velkynvelve, but he and most of his minions had become afflicted by the demon lordâ€“spread madness.
Influenced by madness, Servan started to show heightened paranoia and megalomania. He dreamed of seceding Velkynvelve from Menzoberranzan, to found a land free from the control of the matron mothers.
